dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1727 IS: To rename the National Florence Crittenton Mission.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Wyden introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To rename the National Florence Crittenton Mission.

section.text: Section 1 of the Act of April 9, 1898, entitled an Act To incorporate the National Florence Crittenton Mission is amended by striking National Florence Crittenton Mission and inserting The National Crittenton Foundation.
